text: Yesterday I got the #COVID19 @pfizer #vaccine.  I'm a full-time caregiver for my mom who is 79 and because she's disabled, she's at the bottom of the list.  I'm so grateful I decided to become a #SubstituteTeacher at my husband's @PeteGrigsbyIII school which is why I qualified. https://t.co/btwA6Vqdhw
